author: GameSpot
description:
Its the first episode of Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered, a new GameSpot show where Kurt Indovina and Lucy James tackle the biggest gaming news, debates, and challenges… with a twist. 

Email your letters to gotchacovered@gamespot.com

Check out the audio version:
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/4S5mfmLES0ubhj5xcDZJni
Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/kurt-lucy-gotcha-covered/id1843230752
RSS Feed: https://www.spreaker.com/show/6752166/episodes/feed

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Intro
00:37 - Xbox Game Pass Price Increase
06:07 - $100 Steam Sale Challenge
09:19 - How Do You Save EA?
15:13 - Lucy's Dream Lord of the Rings Game
20:17 - Was Losing Bully 2 Worth it?
21:42 - Rockstar's The Warriors game rules
25:19 - Can We Saved or Destroy Halo?
29:41 - Console Generations
36:16 - Let's Play Sonic Racing Crossworlds
40:14 - Outro
title: Heck of a Week to Start a Gaming News Show | Kurt & Lucy Gotcha Covered
